biography: Mainly known for the end fight in Jackie Chan's 'Who am I?', 1998 Ron worked with the best action stars and directors known today and developed himself in the last 20 years as an actor which with a versatile and experienced action background. In 'Warriors Gate' 2016 (Luc Besson) Ron Ron plays the one of the main hero's: 'The Black Knight'
name: Ron Smoorenburg
